development.TypeScript: I began using TypeScript in 2024 at SDILab. With a background in JavaScript and C#, TypeScript gives me the best of both worlds: the flexibility of JavaScript with the safety and structure of a typed language.

development.React: I began using React in 2024 at SDILab. Since then, I've used it to build both personal and professional projects. Here are some tools and libraries I've worked with.

development.ReactNative: I began using React Native in 2024 at SDILab, alongside React, to build a family of applications for both mobile and desktop.

development.JavaScript: I used JavaScript to refactor a legacy codebase, centralizing AJAX requests in ES6+ classes at Codevision.

development.HTML: I've used HTML for both professional and academic projects since 2020, including a course at UPSKILL.

development.CSS: I've used CSS for both professional and academic projects since 2020, including a course at UPSKILL.

development..NET: I've used .NET and C# to develop HR application modules for Caixa Geral de Depósitos at Minsait and to automate data lifecycle management at Codevision.

development.SQL: I worked with SQL to develop features for an education platform at Codevision.

development.Print Design: As a Graphic Designer, I created print designs for various marketing and communication projects at SIGNA Design.

development.Digital Design: I worked as a Digital Designer, creating video and motion graphics for clients at Carlo&Stefania Design Studio.

development.Digital Marketing: I have experience with digital marketing from my time as a Graphic Designer at SIGNA Design.

development.Motion Design: I have experience with motion design from my time as a Digital Designer and in my freelance work.

development.Vídeo: I have experience with video from my time as a Digital Designer and in my freelance work.
